website_summaries.verdict: The unique shape of this grate is designed to get more airflow into the logs for better burning.
pros: Good for fire pits or pass-through fireplace styles
cons: The legs could be a little bit taller

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Great product, perfect size and shape. Performs well. Arrived quick. Super happy using this in an outdoor fire pit. It has the right height for airflow and holds the wood for an optimal fire.
customer_reviews.author: b.rae

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor Firepit Rack
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy rack. It has been outside in Ohio for over a year, through rain, snow and sun along with over 100 hot multi hour fires without issue. Great buy! The shape and 24" size is perfect for my 40" interior diameter firepit and is the right size base to build a nice stack for a good size fire.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great Fire Grate!
customer_reviews.text: Works great in the fire pit for keeping wood up above the coals. Highly durable and expect this to last for a lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good rack. Contains logs well and will be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my fire pit. Very sturdy. Well packaged for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Tipton

customer_reviews.title: Heavy!
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy grate, perfect for an outdoor fire pit. I put this over a gas burner which works great.
customer_reviews.author: HoustonHouston

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Placed in my fire pit. Bought to raise the fire off the ground to make easier to start. Works perfectly, glad I added.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Beefy though a bit Pricey
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why cast or wrought iron things are so pricey, but not much to say on this except it is a very beefy and have no question it can handle heavy logs in my fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: ID 10 T Error

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly in our firepit. Allows air to circulate underneath to keep the fire burning steadily. This is large enough for a few good sized logs.
customer_reviews.author: DWFan

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good in the Insert
customer_reviews.text: The grate came well packed, in good condition, and as described. Fits nicely into my fire pit insert as well. I have yet to test it in a fire but it seems seems to be solid and should hold up to whatever I throw at it.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan J.

customer_reviews.title: Great grate!
customer_reviews.text: Fits in my round fire pit perfectly. Good quality and welds and should last for years and years
customer_reviews.author: Rigger405

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: just remember as others have stated....it is bigger than you think
customer_reviews.author: snowboundAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We have a two sided fireplace and this was the perfect grate. It looks proportioned from each side and fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy happy
customer_reviews.text: Great pricing, great product. Sturdy and fit in my fire pit exactly how i was hoping it would. This item is a must have for those that have deep fire pits.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: Definitely does the job
customer_reviews.text: This product has very good grate spacing to hold the fire off of my fire pit base and avoid any overheating.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: this grate broke after about 4 fires. I intend to return it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Alan freeman

customer_reviews.title: New Home
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to our new home custom fire pit! We've used it just a few times so far, but it is great! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Maggiore

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful grate however
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful grate however, measurements are not really accurate. My firebox is 41 x 32 and grate was too deep for box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good item.  Beware, larger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. BUT do not go with the measurements they provide. i.e. a 24x24 is almost accurate if you are measuring side to side. But if you measure the furthest points diagonally, it will be more than 24". I originally bought a 27"x27", for my 29" round firepit, but it did not fit and I returned it for the 24"x24". The smaller one fits comfortably inside with about two inches to spare all the way around. The math doesn't work out, I know :-?
customer_reviews.author: Rinna

customer_reviews.title: Solid and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Solid and heavy. We are using for a fire pit, so we see some surface rust. Hopefully, welds remain unaffected. If so, we are happy with the grate. It keeps an airspace under our wood and helps it burn well in our deep fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: This grate was the perfect size for my fire pit
customer_reviews.text: This grate was the perfect size for my fire pit. Keep in mind that the grate flares out at the top. You may need a smaller grate than you think. Make sure if you have stone or sand at the bottom of your fire pit, it is not deeper than the legs because this is a heavy duty grate and will sink under the weight of logs and will sit right on top of the pit with no circulation under the grate.
customer_reviews.author: frenchie

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this since last summer for many hot campfires and it shows no signs of sagging in the middle like the smaller, lighter-guage ones do. It does take a bit to build up the coals underneath because it is about 4 inches off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uniflame says this is NOT for outdoor use!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well, on my second one of these and both started to rust in under two weeks. I contacted Uniflame and they told me this product is NOT designed for outdoor use. WTF??? How can that be? Anyway, beware. The black coating burns off and you'll get rust pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: David Mutnick

customer_reviews.title: Great Grate
customer_reviews.text: An outstanding grate - interesting shape (fits perfectly in my round firepit) and sturdy construction. I'd buy it again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: HOODsters

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We just extended our patio and had a stone fire pit built. I was concerned because our fire pit is round and the grate is hex shaped, but it fit perfectly. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nova18

customer_reviews.title: Filled the bill
customer_reviews.text: We bought a 30 inch fire ring and were looking for something to bring the wood up off the ground and keep the fire contained properly. This was perfect and was exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen K. Burman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: The 24x24in grate fit perfectly in our 27in ID fire pit. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect in circular pit. Holds more wood than conventional rectangular rack
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It really is 24 by 24 as advertised and fits nicely
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Different is better
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to replace your grate this is the shape to buy! It holds more wood than the standard shape and makes a awesome outdoor fire.
customer_reviews.author: CC

product_meta.title: Uniflame, C-1541, 24 in. x 24 in. Hex Bar Grate
product_meta.description: Traditional in design, this durable 24" UniFlame hex log grate, by Blue Rhino, keep logs in place. Its popular black finish will compliment a variety of decor. UniFlame's hex bar grate design provides optimal airflow for wider fireplaces.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars58 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
